data.eml:eml: Pinguisoperla, a new fossil genus of Perlidae (Insecta: Plecoptera) from mid-Cretaceous Burmese amber

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chen, Zhi-Teng (2018): Pinguisoperla, a new fossil genus of Perlidae (Insecta: Plecoptera) from mid-Cretaceous Burmese amber. Zootaxa 4425 (3): 596-600, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4425.3.13
